headline.print_headline: New Labels Won’t Be Much Improved
headline.main: Revised Food Labels Still Won't Tell Whole Story

docs.abstract: Proposed changes will do some good things, like mention added sugars separately. But they won’t make it quick and easy for consumers to choose healthier foods.
docs.snippet: Proposed changes will do some good things, like mention added sugars separately. But they won’t make it quick and easy for consumers to choose healthier foods.

keywords.value: Center for Science in the Public Interest
keywords.name: organizations

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-EU Earmarks $250 Million to Help Develop Ebola Vaccines: Sources
headline.main: Exclusive-EU Earmarks $250 Million to Help Develop Ebola Vaccines: Sources

docs.lead_paragraph: Europe is to plough 200 million euros (155.5 million pounds) into the development of Ebola vaccines, as well as drugs and diagnostic tests, according to two people with direct knowledge of the situation.
docs.snippet: Europe is to plough 200 million euros (155.5 million pounds) into the development of Ebola vaccines, as well as drugs and diagnostic tests, according to two people with direct knowledge of the situation.
